entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 1:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 40 %
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: WSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
